title: Create an object container
s3LegalMentions: S3 is a registered trademark of Amazon Technologies, Inc. OVHcloud services are not sponsored, approved, or affiliated in any way.
createContainerErrorTitle: An error occurred while creating the object container
createContainerSuccessTitle: The object container {{name}} has been created successfully
descriptionOffsiteReplication: Automatically replicate your data to a remote site in an Infrequent Access storage class. <0>Learn more</0>
descriptionVersioning: Automates the creation of versions of an object to prevent accidental deletion, or simply when a new object is uploaded.
descriptionUser: You can grant access to the container to one of your preconfigured OpenStack users with an "Administrator" or "Object Storage Operator" role, or create a new user.
descriptionEncryption: The data dumped into this container is encrypted on the fly by OVHcloud.
pricingDisclaimer: For more information on pricing, <0>see the pricing page</0>.
regionActivationInfo: If a region is not yet available on your project. You can enable it by following this link: <0>enable the region</0>.
regionsNoMatch: No region matches your filters. Adjust your criteria or <0>enable a region</0>.
discoveryModeActivate: You are currently in Discovery mode. To finalize the creation of your container, you need to activate your project.
nameInputMinLengthError: The name must contain at least {{min}} characters
nameInputMaxLengthError: The name must contain at most {{max}} characters
nameInputRegexError: The name must start and end with a letter or a digit, and can only contain lowercase letters, digits, '.' or '-'
containerTypeDescription-static: Quick access and high performance for your sites. Link your domains and transfer your files.
containerTypeDescription-private: Billing, legal information and logs. Simple archiving based on your needs.
containerTypeDescription-public: Multimedia, binary and e-commerce. Store an infinite amount of data.
encryptionTypeLabel-AES256: Server-side encryption with keys managed by OVHcloud (SSE-OMK)
encryptionTypeDescription-AES256: The OVHcloud Managed Keys are managed and used on your behalf by an integrated OVHcloud service with OVHcloud's enhanced KMS
offerTypeDescription-storage-s3-standard: A wide range of S3-compatible features. Available in 1-AZ, 3-AZ, and Local Zones across different storage classes.
offerTypeDescription-storage: Basic solution for storage with no specific performance requirements. This is the native object storage of OpenStack, with Swift APIs.
versionningTypeDisabledPopover: Versioning cannot be disabled as you have enabled replication. Modify the Offsite Replication step if you wish to disable it.
offsiteReplicationVersioningAlert: By enabling Offsite Replication, versioning is also activated.
pci_instances_common_instance_region_dep: Resilient and cost-effective deployment in 1 availability zone.
pci_instances_common_instance_region-3-a: High resilience/high availability deployment for your critical applications across 3 availability zones.
pci_instances_common_instance_localzone_: Deploy your applications as close to your users as possible for low latency and data residency.
nameInputInfo: The name of the container must be between 3 and 63 characters long, must start and end with lowercase alphanumeric characters (from a to z and from 0 to 9), and may include the following punctuation marks: "." and "-".
